p: Lipid peroxidation products were estimated by measuring TBARS and were determined in accordance with the method published by Niehaus & Samuelsson (1968). Nonenzymatic antioxidants such as reduced glutathione (GSH) and catalase (CAT) were estimated as described by Ellman (1959) and Sinha (1972), respectively. SOD activity in the testes was determined according to the method described by Marklund & Marklund (1974)
